**About me**

I'm 4th year PhD student at the Sorbonne Institute of Development Studies (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne), funded by the Telecom company Orange.

My research interests are in digital economics, with a particular focus on development economics.

My thesis provides three impact evaluations of broadband internet deployment on different outcomes (political mobilization, house market, firms' choice of location...). My thesis advisors are Mohamed [Ali Marouani](https://sites.google.com/view/mohamedali-marouani/rieme-conference-paris) and [François Roubaud](https://leda.dauphine.fr/fr/membre/detail-cv/profile/francois-roubaud.html).
